summary:
Forward DNS requests to Cloudflare Gateway by changing the resolver settings in your router, browser, or OS. Use this option if:
  • You want to try out DNS filtering without installing software.
  • You want to apply blanket DNS policies to all devices in a physical location, such as a retail store or office.
abstract:
By the end of this module, you will be able to:

  • Send DNS traffic to Gateway for filtering.
title: Connect to Gateway without an agent
